tag_list: insead, divyabh, crowdanalytix, qualifiedlink, ideabuff, mishra, indian-entrepreneur
overview:
Divyabh is an entrepreneur and currently founder and CEO of qualifiedLINK, an organization focused on developing web applications that allow global businesses to leverage the power of social media and the crowd. qualifiedLINK’s most recent products are:

  1. www.crowdANALYTIX.com, a platform for crowdsourcing data analytics and business insights.
  2. www.ideabuff.com - an online focus groups management tool

Divyabh has over 12 years of experience of which the last 6 have been focused on heading marketing & strategy for leading software and software services organizations. Divyabh’s key achievements include establishing marketing function from scratch for three global IT outsourcing vendors and co-founding of a successful global aerospace consulting firm in India.

Divyabh is an Electrical Engineer with an MS in Computer Science from University of Texas at Dallas and an MBA from INSEAD.
